champ.champInfo:
The management of the organization and conduct of competitions is carried out by the World Federation of Shin Karate SOSHINKAIKAN hereinafter (hereinafter WSKOS). The direct conduct of the competition is entrusted to the Shin Karate Organization of Germany and the panel of judges.

Judges:

  • Chief judge – Shihan Jakub Cerny, 5th dan, Germany
  • Chief kata judge – Sensei Oleg Kindzer, 4th dan, Germany
  • Chief judge of full contact kumite – Shihan Manuel Contreras, 6th dan, Mexico
  • Chief judge of semi-contact kumite – Shikhan Sergey Tsoi, 6th dan, Ukraine
  • Chief judge for knockdown-kumite – Sensei Jacek Szymanski, 4th dan, Poland
  • Observer of the III Open European Cup in SHIN KARATE President of WSKOS Shikhan Andrey Rekunov, 8th dan, USA

Competition location: Realschulturnhalle Zwiesel Hochstraße 11, Zwiesel 94227, Germany

The competition is held on July 13, 2024. Start of the competition - 09:00

Competition regulations

July 13, 2024:

  • 07:30 – 09:00: Weigh-in and final registration of teams
  • 08:00 – 09:00: Introduction of judges, directors, assistants, coaches
  • 09:00 – 12:00: Start of the tournament and official opening of the III OPEN EUROPEAN CUP in Shin Karate
  • 12:00 – 13:30: Lunch break
  • 13:30 – 15:30: Super fights and duels
  • 16.00 – 17:00: Award ceremony (each participant must have his own sports uniform)
  • 17:00 – 18:00: End of the tournament
  • 20:00 – Sayonara Party

Categories of participants:

KNOCKDOWN KUMITE Division (Punches to the head are PROHIBITED):
Category Age Duel time
Veterans (M) 35+ 2 min -60 -70 -75 -80 -85 85+
Veterans (W) 35+ 2 min -60 -70 -75 -80 -85 85+
Men 18+ 2 min -50 -60 -70 -75 -80 80+
Women 18+ 2 min -50 -60 -70 -75 -80 80+
Young men 16-17 2 min -50 -60 -70 -75 -80 80+
Girls 16-17 2 min -50 -60 -70 -75 -80 80+
Young men 14-15 2 min -45 -50 -55 -60 -65 65+
Girls 14-15 2 min -45 -50 -55 -60 -65 65+
Young men 12-13 2 min -40 -45 -50 -55 55+ -
-30 -35 -40 -45 45+ -
Girls 10-11 1.5 min -30 -35 -40 -45 45+ -
THROWS ARE PROHIBITED!
Ashi-Barai is the only accepted technique. The tournament will be held according to WSKOS rules. The tournament organizers reserve the right to change weight categories depending on the number of participants in weight and age categories.

FULL CONTACT KUMITE Division (Boxing Gloves):
Category Age Duel time
Veterans (M) 35+ 2 min -65 -70 -75 -80 -85 -90 90+
Men 18+ 3 min -65 -70 -75 -80 -85 -90 90+
Women 18+ 2 min -55 -60 -65 -70 -75 75+ -
Young men 16-17 2 min -60 -65 -70 -75 -80 80+ -
Girls 16-17 2 min -60 -65 -70 -75 -80 80+ -
THROWS ARE PROHIBITED!
Ashi-Barai is the only accepted technique. The tournament will be held according to WSKOS rules. The tournament organizers reserve the right to change weight categories depending on the number of participants in weight and age categories.
Division SEMI CONTACT KUMITE (Boxing gloves) DO NOT POINT KUMITE!!!:
Category Age Duel time
Young men 14-15 2 min -50 -55 -60 -65 -70 70+ -
Girls 14-15 2 min -45 -50 -55 -60 -65 65+ -
Young men 12-13 1.5 min -40 -45 -50 -55 -60 60+ -
Girls 12-13 1.5 min -40 -45 -50 -55 55+ - -
Young men 10-11 1.5 min -30 -35 -40 -45 45+ - -
Girls 10-11 1.5 min -30 -35 -40 -45 45+ - -
THROWS ARE PROHIBITED!
Ashi-Barai is the only accepted technique. The tournament will be held according to the WSKOS rules. The tournament organizers reserve the right to change weight categories depending on the number of participants in weight and age categories.

Regulations of fights

  • Age 10 – 11 years: 1.5 min, 1.5 min, weighing (weight difference – 2 kg), 1.5 min
  • Age 12 - 17 years: 2.0 min, 2.0 min, weighing (weight difference - 3 kg), 2.0 min
  • Age 18+:2.0 min, 2.0 min, weighing (weight difference – 3 kg), 2.0 min
  • Veterans 35+: 2.0 min, 2.0 min, weigh-in (weight difference – 3 kg), 2.0 min
SUPER FIGHTS – FULL CONTACT (Boxing gloves)

The Superfight category includes intro music, intro and 5x2 minute fights in the category of your choice: Boxing, K1, Kicklight and MMA. Please contact the organizer if you or your participant would like to take part in the SUPER FIGHT category. (Weight, age, fighting skill and fighting history).

KATA Division:
Category Age KYU
Masters 35+ 1st dan and above
Adults 18-34 2 kyu and higher
Adults 18-34 4-3 kyu
Adults 18-34 10-5 kyu
Leaders 16-17 4-1 kyu
Leaders 16-17 10-5 kyu
Cadets 12-15 4-1 kyu
Cadets 12-15 10-5 kyu
Children 6-11 no restrictions on kyu

Uniform and equipment of participants

All athletes must wear clean karate gi with a belt corresponding to the athlete's qualifications.
The judges must be dressed according to the competition rules:

  • White short sleeve shirt with WSKOS logo and black tie
  • Black pants
  • Barefoot
  • Personal whistle is required!

Protective equipment for divisions - Full Contact Kumite, Semi Contact Kumite:

  • Helmet
  • Boxing gloves: children - at least 8 ounces, juniors and cadets - at least 10 ounces, adults - at least 12 ounces
  • Shields - white
  • Mouth guard
  • Bib for everyone under 12 years old, girls and women – MANDATORY

Financing terms

All expenses for organizing and holding the III OPEN EUROPEAN CUP in Shin Karate are covered by the Shin Karate Organization of Germany.

  • The cost of participation in one category is 40 euros. For each subsequent 20 euros
  • The cost of participation in Super Fight is 50 euros
  • All contributions go towards administrative costs for the III Open European Shin Karate Cup
  • After payment, the entry fee is not refundable!

PayPal account: Cerny.Jakub@yahoo.com

Cashless payment:

Bank name: VR Geno Bank

BIK: GENODEF1DGV

IBAN: DE72741900000002564742

Awards

  • Individual cups, medals and diplomas for winners
  • Certificates of participation and personal badges for each participant
  • Other gifts

Registration

Registration for participation in the III Open European Cup in Shin Karate is carried out until June 30, 2024. Registration link: https://alliance-kumite.net/champ/shin_europe_07_24/coach
